original: Josefson, Oscar Arne, bankdirektör, Alingsås, f. 1/3/02 i Trollhättan av J. O. J. o. Ulrika Olsson. G. 31 m. Margit Salvén. Barn: Anne-Marie f. 32, Ulla 37. •— Stud:ex. i Vänersborg 21, jur. kand. i Upps. 26. E. o. not. i Göta hovr. m. tingstjg. v. Flundre m. fl. doms. 26-29, bitr. jurist å Trollhättans Jur. Byrå o. sekr. i stadsstyr. 29-30, etabl. firma Arne Josefsons Adv:byrå i Alingsås 30 (överl. 43), verkst. dir., omb :man, styr :led. samt huv:man i Sparbanken i Alingsås. Led. av styr. f. Sparbank, förhandl :-org. o. dess förhandl :deleg., Sparbank, säkerh :kassa. Sv. sparb:fören. stud:-råd, Sparfrämj. råd. Landstingsman, ’kd. av landstingets förv :utsik., av styr. f. landstinigets norra rättshj :anst., län. poliskoill., led. av stadsfullim., ordf. i brandstyr., v. ordf. i polisndi, led. av beredn :utsk., hyresndn, komm. f. barn-krubbe- o. barntnädg :verks., av stadsfullm. utsedd repr. i Alüngsås IF, sam-realsk :styr., ordf. i Alingsås höger-fören., led. av styr. f. N. Älvsb. höger-förb., Tekaverken, Alimgsås Brygg., Thermia-Verken, Alingsås Fastigh. A-B Alingsås Snickerifabr. A-B, Konfektions A-B Drabant, Fastigh. A-B Småindustrier, Lindahl & Niermark A-B samt fl. ideella fören. Me dl. av Frim|urarorden, Göt. förb., Rotarykl. o. Alingsås klubbsällsk. Göt. förb. förtj :t.
translated: Josefson, Oscar Arne, bank director, Alingsås, b. 1/3/02 in Trollhättan to J. O. J. and Ulrika Olsson. Married on 31/xx/xx to Margit Salvén. Children: Anne-Marie b. 32, Ulla b. 37. •— Graduated from Vänersborg school 21, completed law degree at Uppsala 26. Assistant clerk at Göta Court of Appeal with legal clerkship at Flundre and various courts from 26-29, assistant lawyer at Trollhättan's Juridiska Byrå and secretary in city government from 29-30. Established Arne Josefsons Adv:byrå in Alingsås in 30 (closed in 43). Executive director, trustee, board member, and chairman of the Savings Bank in Alingsås. Board member of Savings Bank negotiating organization and its negotiation delegations, Savings Bank security fund, Swedish Savings Bank Association study council, and Savings Promotions Council. County councilman, member of county council's facilities committee, board member of northern legal aid agency, county police board member, member of city council, chairman of fire squad, vice chairman of police authority, member of preparatory committee, tenancy tribunal, children's nursery and care commission, and Alingsås IF sports club representative designated by city council. Board member of Sam-realsk, chairman of Alingsås conservative party, board member of North Älvsborg conservative union, Tekaverken, Alingsås Brygg., Thermia-Verken, Alingsås Fastigh. A-B Alingsås Snickerifabr. A-B, Konfektions A-B Drabant, Fastigh. A-B Småindustrier, Lindahl & Niermark A-B, and various non-profit organizations. Member of Freemasonry Order, Göta Federation, Rotary Club and Alingsås Club Society. Awarded Göta Federation merit.

memberOf.name: Swedish Savings Bank Association study council
